Day Of Deafeat ist ein Beweis dafür, dass man mit einem Spiel genauso viel Spaß haben kann, welches keine Killstreaks, Ränge oder tolle, völlig überbewertete Abzeichen vergibt. Ein einfaches Eroberungsspiel, welches bislang, zumindestens nach Meiner erfahrung, völlig ohne Cheater auskam. Es ist einfach immer schön am Nachmittag nach Hause zu kommen, sich an den Rechner zu setzten und entspannt ein Ründchen zu zocken. Ohne gleich als Cheater beschimpft zu werden und ohne gleich auszurasten ,weil man keine Punkte bzw. Killstreaks bekommt. Einfach für jeden der auf typischen Multiplayer der alten Art steht.

Another fantastic game by Valve. Not really much to say, other then I wish Valve would follow up DoD:S with a sequel to revive the franchise as they did with Counter-Strike through CS:GO or DotA through Dota 2. While it isn't the most active game, especially compared to Counter-Strike: Source, there is still a dedicated player base meaning that you'll pretty much always find a server full of people. If the gameplay interests you, I'd say buy it, especially as it goes on sale for very cheap every so often.
This game was my high school crush... is that sad?

I used to be obsessed with this game. Now if you played it you'd think it was a joke just like some old Call of Duty 3 or something. It's just a WWII shooter with capture point gameplay, nothing more. Pick your weapon class and spawn away.

Fun WW2 multiplayer game. It started out as a community mod for halflife 1. I used to play this a lot back in the day, but now I think it's run its course. World War 2 is over in video games and capture the flag/assault the point is a cliché in multiplayer now.

Probably the most overlooked and underrated game of the decade. THIS game is the ultimate no-bones live first-person shooter. Raw, in your face, and loads of fun - with great groups, clans, & people to-boot.
Create maps or just log in to one of many host servers, respect the rules of engagement and your fellow players, and brace yourself for a rollicking good time.
One of my favorites is Riddick's One-Shot One-Kill sniper map server.
I'm really glad this mod-made-game carried over to the Source engine. Day of Defeat is one of the best mods ever created for Half-Life, and honestly, probably my favorite even over Counter-Strike.
二战游戏的经典啊~

You think you're hardcore because you're 12 and you play mature games? Get a load of yourself, kid. THIS GAME RIGHT HERE IS THE SHIZNIT. SERIOUSLY. AS YOUR K/D RATIO INCREASE on each round, SO DOES YOUR BEARD AND YOUR BALLS. Each time you get shot, YOU DIE. THAT'S IT. SAY GOODBYE TO MEDKITS AND REGENERATIVE HEALTH, BRO. Those features are for insecure pussies anyway. In Day of Defeat, YOU DIE ALL THE TIME. If you want to be the victor, you need to grab your goddamn rifle, run to cover, crouch to take steady aim, and use your ironscope like it was the fist of the north star, shoot dem piercing bullets through your enemy, pull out your nade, yell PANZERSCHRECK!!!!!! at the top of your lungs, throw it, THEN LOOK DEATH IN THE EYES, and tell it TO GO FUCK ITSELF. In this game, it's Axis vs Wermacht. You can be 'MURRIKA, (FUCK YEAH) or HITLER'S PERSONAL ARMY. You also get 6 classes to choose upon. 6 CLASSES. I TOLD YOU THIS GAME WAS HARDCORE. Make sure you are near a hospital because YOUR HEART MAY NOT TAKE IT.
Fucking Awesome

This game is one of the most fun FPS's I have played. If you know me that means I have played a lot of them! It mixes realism with very team oriented objectives. Strategy is an important part of this game. All of which set in a World War Two backdrop. It is very similar to Counter Strike. I love this Game!

I really wish this game would get a remake! Probably the only shooter that i never hated or got tired of. Enjoyed pretty much every second of it. Easy to play hard to master, perfect casual shooter and for the most part nice people playing it. I miss the old DoD and DoD:S days! It's about time for a revival!

Quite possibly one of the best WW2 shooters out there.

A very steep learning curve, in regards to the guns and their accuracy, but so very rewarding when you get into the flow of things.

Visually pretty and sounds great. Some great voice commands to scream as your getting shot at/shoot at something.

A few weak point thought. My main gripe is the melee. This is a game where you gotta SELECT the melee weapon. They include and are limited to a knife/knuckle duster contraption that your guy refuses to use to its full potential and just thumps enemies with it rather than using the seemingly VERY SHARP KNIFE PART, or the spade. Yep, a spade, why not? Geneva convention? Wuzzat?

Oh, or the best melee weapon; Your fists. But you can only use YOUR FISTS, if you have a smg. No no, ONLY IF YOU HAVE AN SMG. I really feel the melee lets this game down, and would be better with a designated melee button that attacks with whatever you got in your hand.

Other than that, fun times.

Valve has abandoned DoD:S. It only receives updates from the Source engine patches, but still has a small community playing.

My first and favorite Source-based competitive shooter.  It's fast -- but not too fast, tactical -- but not too tactical, brutally unforgiving -- but not too brutal... you get what I mean.  It's the goldilocks of the Source bunch, in my opinion.  Give it a try sometime.
if you love counter strike and tf2 you will love this

Da piccolino, all'età di circa 14 anni, giocavo a CSS e mi sembrava il gioco più bello del mondo, in quanto la fisica era (e rimane) davvero ben fatta, inoltre la grafica e il sonoro erano anchessi curatissimi. Questo è semplicemente la rivisitazione storica di CSS. Da provare assolutamente.
